item.title: Arch Linux Unofficial user repositories
item.description: Introduction archstrike In Arch Linux, the common way to install new software is install software from official repositorie. But, on some of special fields, there are lots of unofficial user repositorie is avaliable. For example, archstrike is a famous repository for security professionals and enthusiasts. In this article, I will tech you how to use others repositorie and how to make you own repositorie for share your package with others person.
